description: The apartment is bright and clean, with a spacious open floor plan and a full sized fold out couch in the living room. There are two bedrooms and one bathroom. The 6 train is on our corner- It is a convenient 15 min. ride to Grand central. The 2,3 is a seven minute walk away. Central park is nearby, as is Museum Mile. The area is vibrant and there are really amazing places to eat in the often overlooked neighborhood.
name: Bright and Sunny 2 Bedroom Apt.
